医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究表明社交媒体的高使用率与青少年吸烟和吸电子烟的增加有关年轻人使用社交媒体平台以及吸烟和电子烟的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Study-links-high-social-media-use-to-increased-smoking-and-vaping-among-youth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Study-links-high-social-media-use-to-increased-smoking-and-vaping-among-youth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b09664b3-2ab9-4f93-a2c0-65746d576ccf Fri, 17 May 2024 07:11:00 -0400 Study links high social media use to increased smoking and vaping among youth
专科医学的诱惑将执业护士从初级保健中拉出来对于许多患者来说，看执业护士已成为初级保健的常规部分，其中这些“护士”经常执行与患者依赖医生相同的任务。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/The-lure-of-specialty-medicine-pulls-nurse-practitioners-from-primary-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/The-lure-of-specialty-medicine-pulls-nurse-practitioners-from-primary-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8950941e-e73c-4dc4-90a5-10419ca9c34f Fri, 17 May 2024 07:00:26 -0400 The lure of specialty medicine pulls nurse practitioners from primary care
清洁的针头可以拯救生命。在某些州，它们可能不合法。金·博泰彻 (Kim Botteicher) 几乎不认为自己是罪犯。博泰谢尔在宾夕法尼亚州玻利瓦尔市一座前天主教堂的主楼层经营着一家花店和咖啡馆。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Clean-needles-save-lives-In-some-states-they-might-not-be-legal.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Clean-needles-save-lives-In-some-states-they-might-not-be-legal.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ab06ca24-c616-4b31-aecc-d61ab0d7ca01 Fri, 17 May 2024 06:56:22 -0400 Clean needles save lives. In some states, they might not be legal.
研究显示，男性因糖尿病而面临更大的心血管和肾脏问题风险研究人员调查了糖尿病患者微血管和大血管并发症发生率的性别差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Men-face-greater-risk-of-cardioangiography-and-kidney-issues-due-to-diabetes-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Men-face-greater-risk-of-cardioangio-and-kidney-issues-due-to-diabetes-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f83598ea-4a59-4e32-b3ca-479858f1006d Fri, 17 May 2024 06:28:00 -0400 Men face greater risk of cardiovascular and kidney issues due to diabetes, study shows
H5N1 禽流感毒株传染给魁北克海豹，引发人畜共患恐慌研究描述了魁北克灰海豹和斑海豹因高致病性甲型禽流感 (H5N1) 病毒株而异常死亡，引发了人们对潜在人畜共患病蔓延的担忧。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/H5N1-avian-flu-strain-jumps-to-seals-in-Quebec-raise-zoonotic-fears.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/H5N1-avian-flu-strain-jumps-to-seals-in-Quebec-raise-zoonotic-fears.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ccf89770-eee6-49f6-8803-cd42920974e4 Fri, 17 May 2024 01:29:00 -0400 H5N1 avian flu strain jumps to seals in Quebec, raising zoonotic fears
疫苗接种前的 COVID-19：美国研究显示住院率为 5.7%，死亡率为 1.7%研究估计了美国在疫苗接种前期间的 COVID-19 住院率和死亡率，揭示了结果中的显着年龄和种族差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Pre-vaccine-COVID-19-US-study-reveals-hospitalization-rate-of-5725-and-fatality-rate-of-1725.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Pre-vaccine-COVID-19-US-study-reveals-hospitalization-rate-of-5725-and-fatality-rate-of-1725.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c91e2bef-48b6-4c3d-9509-369df8950679 Fri, 17 May 2024 01:08:00 -0400 Pre-vaccine COVID-19: US study reveals hospitalization rate of 5.7% and fatality rate of 1.7%
基于纬度和皮肤类型的个性化维生素 D 指南可以解决维生素 D 缺乏的问题研究强调了根据纬度、皮肤类型和季节变化提出个性化维生素 D 摄入量建议的重要性，为解决普遍缺乏维生素 D 的问题提供了宝贵的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Personalized-vitamin-D-guidelines-based-on-latitude-and-skin-type-could-tackle-deficicies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240517/Personalized-vitamin-D-guidelines-based-on-latitude-and-skin-type-could-tackle-deficicies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3b44c98b-d1dd-48d6-990e-d2f821b6c181 Fri, 17 May 2024 00:14:00 -0400 Personalized vitamin D guidelines based on latitude and skin type could tackle deficiencies
研究显示植物性饮食可降低癌症和心脏病风险研究表明，植物性饮食可显着降低癌症和心脏代谢疾病的风险，同时改善整体健康指标。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Plant-based-diets-reduce-cancer-and-heart-disease-risks-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Plant-based-diets-reduce-cancer-and-heart-disease-risks-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=213245de-c922-48ba-a8b9-6e914173e45c Thu, 16 May 2024 23:59:00 -0400 Plant-based diets reduce cancer and heart disease risks, study shows
促进线粒体健康可以逆转衰老和阿尔茨海默病中的蛋白质聚集人们早就知道，阿尔茨海默病和大多数其他神经退行性疾病的一个标志是大脑中不溶性蛋白质聚集体聚集在一起。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Boosting-mitochondrial-health-can-reverse- Protein-clumping-in-aging-and-Alzheimers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Boosting-mitochondrial-health-can-reverse- Protein-clumping-in-aging-and-Alzheimers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=872e98aa-8423-42bb-ab5c-6696a2fd9acb Thu, 16 May 2024 23:51:12 -0400 Boosting mitochondrial health can reverse protein clumping in aging and Alzheimer's
研究发现大脑回路连接薄弱会影响暴饮暴食和肥胖为什么有的人吃饱了就能轻易停止进食，而有的人却不能，从而导致肥胖？ https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Weak-brain- Circuit-connection-found-to-influence-overeating-and-obesity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240516/Weak-brain- Circuit-connection-found-to-influence-overeating-and-obesity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=72e0bcf2-6d84-4d1d-a564-38180d4bd8d2 Thu, 16 May 2024 23:44:54 -0400 Weak brain circuit connection found to influence overeating and obesity
